nodes.text: Life Day Patriarch was a painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It was part of a series of three paintings, alongside Life Day Matriarch and Life Day Kashyyyk, that were made for the festivities of Life Day. The painting in question depicted a stern male Wookiee. It was supplied during the events of an annual Life Day celebration on Kashyyyk.

Life Day Patriarch, alongside Life Day Kashyyyk and Life Day Matriarch, were supplied randomly to players who chose a painting instead of a Life Day orb, although they could skip both altogether if they only asked for a robe and were also Wookiees. As of 2005, it is no longer available, and thus is considered a collector's item.
